topic.title: Uninstall Yeastar Click to Call
topic.shortdesc: Remove Yeastar Click to Call from Google Chrome Browser if you don't need it.

body.p: Follow one of the methods below to uninstall Yeastar Click to Call.
Open Google Chrome Browser, and choose one of the following methods:

ul.li: In the search bar (URL field), enter chrome://extensions/, go to Yeastar Click to Call and click Remove.

On the right of search bar (URL field), go to
Remove from Chrome... . After the confirmation dialog pops up, click Remove.
